term_line2: Detection / Defense / Governance / Ethical Offense: ACTIVE ✅
hero_sub: Cloud & Cybersecurity Engineer — Network & Threat Defense
hero_p: I design secure architectures, detect threats, perform ethical attacks to strengthen systems, and prepare organizations for high-level cybersecurity.
skills_tagline: Hybrid Red/Blue. Cloud & Network Defense. Identity-First Security. Governance & Risk.
projects_tagline: Concrete excerpts (Case Files). Full details coming in their dedicated page.

skills_item_soc.title: SOC / SC-200
skills_item_soc.text: Sentinel, KQL, XDR, SOAR, incident response.

skills_item_azure.title: Azure Security / AZ-500
skills_item_azure.text: Zero Trust, Defender for Cloud, Key Vault, NSG/WAF.

skills_item_offensive.title: Offensive / CEH
skills_item_offensive.text: Nmap, DVWA, Burp, MITM, WPA2, Wireshark.

skills_item_grc.title: Governance, Risk & Compliance
skills_item_grc.text: Policies, ISO 27005 Risk Register, IR Playbook, Audit.

proj_soc.title: SOC — RDP Brute-force Detection
proj_soc.desc: KQL rule + SOAR playbook, Sentinel dashboard & incident report.

proj_azure.title: Azure Zero Trust Lab
proj_azure.desc: Conditional Access, Defender for Cloud, Key Vault.

proj_ceh.title: CEH — DVWA Exploit & Mitigation
proj_ceh.desc: Burp Suite workflow + remediation & OWASP mapping.
